languages.text: Иные же, более осведомленные, молчали о ксеноартефакте, обретенном Вольным Торговцем и всегда носимом при себе. С годами он буквально прирос к плоти {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости, и наросшая поверх него кожа скрыла глифы цвета вермилион, начертанные на поверхности странного украшения.

Others who were better informed kept quiet about the xeno-artefact the Rogue Trader had acquired and thereafter kept constantly on {mf|his|her} person. As the years passed, it quite literally became a part of {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The skin that grew over the artefact hid the vermillion glyphs inscribed on the strange accessory's surface.
languages.original_text: Иные же, более осведомленные, молчали о ксеноартефакте, обретенном Вольным Торговцем и всегда носимом при себе. С годами он буквально прирос к плоти {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости, и наросшая поверх него кожа скрыла глифы цвета вермилион, начертанные на поверхности странного украшения.

traits.locale_text: Others, more informed, kept quiet about the xeno-artefact, that Rogue Trader acquired and always kept on {mf|him|her}self. As the years passed, it quite literally grew into a part of {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Skin, that grew over the artefact, hid the glyphs of vermilion colour inscribed on the surface of this strange accessory.

Others, more informed, kept quiet about the xeno-artefact, that Rogue Trader acquired and always kept on {mf|him|her}self. As the years passed, it quite literally grew into a part of {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Skin, that grew over the artefact, hid the glyphs of vermilion colour inscribed on the surface of this strange accessory.

Others more informed kept quiet about the xeno-artefact acquired and coveted by the Rogue Trader. As the years passed, it quite literally became a part of {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The skin that grew over the artefact hid the vermillion glyphs inscribed on the strange accessory's surface.

Others more informed kept quiet about the xeno-artefact acquired and coveted by the Rogue Trader. As the years passed, it quite literally became a part of {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The skin that grew over the artefact hid the vermillion glyphs inscribed on the strange accessory's surface.

Others who were better informed kept quiet about the xeno-artefact the Rogue Trader had acquired and thereafter kept constantly on {mf|his|her} person. As the years passed, it quite literally became a part of {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The skin that grew over the artefact hid the vermillion glyphs inscribed on the strange accessory's surface.

Others who were better informed kept quiet about the xeno-artefact the Rogue Trader had acquired and thereafter kept constantly on {mf|his|her} person. As the years passed, it quite literally became a part of {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The skin that grew over the artefact hid the vermillion glyphs inscribed on the strange accessory's surface.

languages.text: 还有一部分消息灵通的人，他们绝口不谈行商浪人时刻携带的异形造物。随着岁月的流逝，它真真正正地成为了行商浪人身体的一部分。增生的皮肤盖住了这件古怪的造物，盖住了造物表面刻下的朱红色符号。
languages.original_text: Others who were better informed kept quiet about the xeno-artefact the Rogue Trader had acquired and thereafter kept constantly on {mf|his|her} person. As the years passed, it quite literally became a part of {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The skin that grew over the artefact hid the vermillion glyphs inscribed on the strange accessory's surface.

traits.locale_text: 还有一部分消息灵通的人，他们绝口不谈行商浪人身上的异形造物。随着岁月的流逝，它真真正正地成为了行商浪人身体的一部分。增生的皮肤盖住了这件古怪的造物，盖住了造物表面刻下的朱红色符号。

languages.text: Besser informierte Kreise bewahrten Stillschweigen über das Xenos-Artefakt, das {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} an sich gebracht hatte und fortan ständig bei sich trug. Die Jahre vergingen und es wurde buchstäblich ein Teil {mf|seiner|ihrer} {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Haut, die über das Artefakt wuchs, verbarg die zinnoberroten Glyphen auf der Oberfläche des merkwürdigen Accessoires.
languages.original_text: Others who were better informed kept quiet about the xeno-artefact the Rogue Trader had acquired and thereafter kept constantly on {mf|his|her} person. As the years passed, it quite literally became a part of {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The skin that grew over the artefact hid the vermillion glyphs inscribed on the strange accessory's surface.

traits.locale_text: Andere, die besser informiert waren, sagten nichts über das Xeno-Artefakt, das {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} begehrt und beschafft hatte. Die Jahre vergingen und es wurde buchstäblich ein Teil {mf|seiner|ihrer} {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Haut, die über das Artefakt wuchs, verbarg die zinnoberroten Glyphen auf der Oberfläche des merkwürdigen Accessoires.

languages.text: Ceux qui étaient dans le secret gardèrent le silence sur le xéno-artefact acquis et jalousement gardé par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Au fil du temps, il devint partie intégrante de Sa Seigneurie. La peau qui avait cicatrisé sur l'artefact cachait les glyphes vermillon inscrits sur la surface de l'étrange accessoire.
languages.original_text: Others who were better informed kept quiet about the xeno-artefact the Rogue Trader had acquired and thereafter kept constantly on {mf|his|her} person. As the years passed, it quite literally became a part of {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The skin that grew over the artefact hid the vermillion glyphs inscribed on the strange accessory's surface.

traits.locale_text: Ceux qui étaient dans le secret gardèrent le silence sur le xéno-artefact acquis et jalousement gardé par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Au fil du temps, il devint partie intégrante de Sa Seigneurie. La peau qui avait cicatrisé sur l'artefact cachait les glyphes vermillon inscrits sur la surface de l'étrange accessoire.

languages.text: Los mejor informados guardaron silencio sobre el xenoartefacto que adquirió {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y que llevaba constantemente consigo. Con el paso de los años, acabó por convertirse literalmente en parte de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. La piel que creció sobre el artefacto ocultó los glifos bermellones inscritos en la superficie del extraño accesorio.
languages.original_text: Others who were better informed kept quiet about the xeno-artefact the Rogue Trader had acquired and thereafter kept constantly on {mf|his|her} person. As the years passed, it quite literally became a part of {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The skin that grew over the artefact hid the vermillion glyphs inscribed on the strange accessory's surface.

traits.locale_text: Los mejor informados guardaron silencio sobre el xenoartefacto que adquirió {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y con el que se obsesionó. Con el paso de los años, acabó por convertirse literalmente en parte de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. La piel que creció sobre el artefacto ocultó los glifos bermellones inscritos en la superficie del extraño accesorio.

languages.text: 自由開拓者が手に入れ、その後もすぐそばに置き続けていた異種族のアーティファクトについて、詳しいことを知る者たちはそろって口を閉ざしていた。年月が経つにつれて、それは文字どおり{mf|彼|彼女}の一部となった。アーティファクトの上に生えた皮膚により、その奇妙なアクセサリーの表面に刻まれていた朱色のグリフは隠された。
languages.original_text: Others who were better informed kept quiet about the xeno-artefact the Rogue Trader had acquired and thereafter kept constantly on {mf|his|her} person. As the years passed, it quite literally became a part of {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The skin that grew over the artefact hid the vermillion glyphs inscribed on the strange accessory's surface.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者が手に入れ、その後もすぐそばに置き続けていた異種族のアーティファクトについて、詳しいことを知る者たちはそろって口を閉ざしていた。年月が経つにつれて、それは文字どおり{mf|彼|彼女}の一部となった。アーティファクトの上に生えた皮膚により、その奇妙なアクセサリーの表面に刻まれていた朱色のグリフは隠された。

languages.text: Konu hakkında daha fazla bilgiye sahip olanlar ise Hür Tacir'in elde ettiği ve her daim yanında tuttuğu zeno eseri konusunda seslerini çıkarmamayı tercih ediyordu. Bu eser, yıllar geçtikçe kelimenin tam anlamıyla {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin bir parçası oldu. Eserin üzerinde büyüyen deri, tuhaf aksesuarın yüzeyine işlenmiş parlak glifleri kapattı.
languages.original_text: Others who were better informed kept quiet about the xeno-artefact the Rogue Trader had acquired and thereafter kept constantly on {mf|his|her} person. As the years passed, it quite literally became a part of {mf|His|Her} {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The skin that grew over the artefact hid the vermillion glyphs inscribed on the strange accessory's surface.

traits.locale_text: Konu hakkında daha fazla bilgiye sahip olan diğerleri ise Hür Tacir'in elde ettiği ve her daim yanında tuttuğu zeno eseri konusunda seslerini çıkarmamayı tercih ediyorlardı. Bu eser, yıllar geçtikçe kelimenin tam anlamıyla {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin bir parçası hâline geldi. Eserin üzerinde büyüyen deri, tuhaf aksesuarın yüzeyine işlenmiş parlak glifleri kapattı.
